commit message:
Merge branch 'master' into material

Conflicts:
app/build.gradle
app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml
Use FOSDEM colors for dialogs and AlertDialogs under Material theme.
New sliding tabs implementation for Material Design
Fix: main progress now properly uses the Material style on Android 5.
Make DialogTheme inherit from the new AppCompat dialog theme to simplify styles.
Restored: emulate allCaps for API<14 in SlidingTabLayout

Added extended title Toolbar for PersonInfoActivity
+ Fixed toolbar elevation value.

- Make tabs in SlidingTabLayout focusable for keyboard input
- Use the Support Library's selectableItemBackground instead of the platform one to allow selectable backgrounds on API<14.
Removed unnecessary titles and use the same titles for TrackScheduleActivity and TrackScheduleEventActivity
New styles for headers and metadata in event details.
Added support for direct search from Google Now
Fix: properly clear the links container view with the new layout in EventDetailsFragment.
New dual-pane tablet layout featuring extended height Toolbar and CardView.
Fix: Remove the EventDetailsFragment from the FragmentManager after switching from dual pane to single pane mode to prevent its ActionBar icons from showing up.
Added Floating Action Button in dual-pane layout of TrackScheduleActivity
